trends: There has been one other sighting in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around February 13th 2013
divs: sighting detailsmy relative was driving in monroe county,illinois 02\13\2013 toward columbia,il. he was looking out the drivers side window,and saw a square-shaped object,brown in color,it had a type of turret on one side. it was treetop level. estimated speed was about 80mph. it made no sound. it was about 10:00 am.
